Package src.entities

Class Cinema

java.lang.Object
src.entities.Cinema
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cinema extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Cinema in the system It contains movies, prices of the movies, showtimes, seats and seat layout
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Cinema

      public Cinema(String cinemaName, ArrayList<Movie> movies, HashMap<String,ArrayList<LocalDateTime>> showtimes, HashMap<String,ArrayList<Seat>> seats)
      Creates a Cinema with the given attributes
      Parameters:
      cinemaName - This Cinema's name
      movies - Movies available in this Cinema
      showtimes - All showtimes for each movies in this Cinema
      seats - All seats for each movie in this Cinema

    • setCustomer

      public boolean setCustomer(Customer customer, String title, int index)
      Sets the Customer to a Seat whenever a booking is done in this Cinema
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer Object
      title - Movie title
      index - Seat index
      Returns:
      True if Customer is successfully set, False if unsuccessful
